Reviews.Title: BLACKBRRY CURVE
Reviews.Author: Ann Bacon
Reviews.Content: THE 8310 IS A GREAT BLACKBERRY.  I PURCHASED THE UPGRADE TO THE TORCH AND WENT BACKWARDS TO THE CURVE BECAUSE IT IS MUCH EASIER TO USE.  THE BLACKBERRY TORCHDOES NOT MAKE ANY SENSE.  I WILL STAY WITH THE BLACKBERRY CURVE WHICH IS A GOODCHOICE.  I PURCHASED IT AND I AM GLAD I DID...

Reviews.Title: Very good- revised review
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: I love BlackBerry and haven't had one that I didn't love. This model is no different. It's a great phone with nice features, easy to use and pretty too. I bought a 'very good' condition phone from Teczilla. It's in gorgeous condition, cost a lot less than a brand new one,  and arrived 2 days early. I'm veryyy happy with my purchase, and my phone!! Giving the BlackBerry Curve 8310 5 stars.Revised Review- I've had to change my review as the phone will rarely send a picture, either one I've taken, or one I've received, without causing its appearance to be completely impossible to view or only partially viewable. Newer phones work fine. I think it's only because its such an older version phone. But disappointing because my previous phone didn't have a camera, and that's why I purchased this one. This has no reflection on Amazon. Just an FYI for future purchasers of older model phones.

Reviews.Title: Alright phone for the money.
Reviews.Author: Carlos Rosales "carlos rosales"
Reviews.Content: I don't have this model anymore. Besides in my collection. Since I am into BlackBerry OS and iOS. I can tell you that this phone isn't bad. It does everything that it was made to do. Gives great Wireless LAN connectivity and the 3g is a plus for this Model which if I remember correctly is running 4.5 But it is somewhat outdated now. But still user friendly just add some eye candy (THEME) and you wont be able to tell the difference from let's say a 9630 or 85xx where the 85XX is simply an updated version of the 83XX with 5.0 OS. as of now I use the Blackberry 8350i for work. and My BlackBerry 9780 for Personal. I enjoy this for I have 5.0 on my 8350i Unlike the previous 8310 ,8320, 8330 which will more than likely stay at 4.5.0, 4.5.1. But if you are reading this looking to find if you will find a Powerful RIM device for Business/Personal go for it you won't be disappointed at a device coming from RIM.

Reviews.Title: Crappy phone
Reviews.Author: Winston
Reviews.Content: The phone did not work a piece of CRAP I took it to Jamaica I thought it was the battery it was the phone.

Reviews.Title: Dont by from VibeCellular
Reviews.Author: W. Beckles "wbeckle"
Reviews.Content: GPS does not work. USB Mass storage does not work. No memory card. Battery dies in 2 days.Other than that its a great phone.

Reviews.Title: it was not unlocked
Reviews.Author: Mariceli
Reviews.Content: I GOT THE PHONE FOR MY HUSBAND FOR FATHER DAY...WHEN MY HUSBAND PUT IN THE SIM CARD IT DIDNT WORK AT ALL....THE PHONE WAS NOT UNLOCKED I WILL NOT ORDER OF THIS PEOPLE ANYMORE...I'M GOING TO SEND IT BACK......I CALL THEM 4 TIME AND DIDNT PICK UP THE PHONE....THINK BEFORE YOU BUY FROM THIS CUSTOMER....MARICELI MEDINA

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: Tanya R. Kirkland
Reviews.Content: These phones just didn't work right for us, one thing was that one of the phones had so much static in the ear, second the phones kept cutting off.

Reviews.Title: The unexpected
Reviews.Author: Sappa
Reviews.Content: Phone came in good physical condition, but after inserting my sim card, to my surprise, the phone was still locked! to make matters worst battery was not taking any charging. However after contacting  the seller I was refunded for the cost of  unlocking the phone locally. Response was quick and hustle free I must say.However I ended up had to replace the battery.

Reviews.Title: Scratched and very used
Reviews.Author: Alvin Sumigcay
Reviews.Content: All buttons work and functions normally however there were several scratches and paint chipping. It feels quite old and very used.

Reviews.Title: The Blackberry Service and Messenger are not working
Reviews.Author: Mohamed Soliman
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of this Blackberry and both Blackberry Service and BBM are not working. RIM along with my mobile opperator couldn't fix them.Don't buy this product even if it is for free.

Reviews.Title: de lo peor
Reviews.Author: Cristobal Rico
Reviews.Content: me enviaron un producto todo partido sin batería la carcasa esta toda descuadrada no cierra la tapa de atrás en fin me enviaron un aparato inservible porque le partieron el sujetador del chic de linea

Reviews.Title: After 2 months still waiting for my item!!!!
Reviews.Author: LeonRDO
Reviews.Content: so bad customer services. after 2 months no answers about my item, maybe fishing or fake company.please dont buy her

Reviews.Title: DISGRUNTLED
Reviews.Author: SM25
Reviews.Content: I bought and received this phone December 11, 2012 and it has shut off on me 4 times in a week. At first I thought I was pushing the button in my pocket but it just shut off today for the 5th time this week and now it won't turn on at all. What the hell kind of deal is a good one when you buy a phone supposedly "brand new" and this is what happens and I haven't gotten a response and there is no number to call readily available!

Reviews.Title: terrible phone
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I normally love blackberrys but this phone is  terrible. Half the time the bluetooth will not conect with my cars bluetooth  The phone freezes up  and the only way to get it to work is take out the battery and let it reset. I guess you get what you pay for as the phone was cheap for a blackberry .I wasted my money on this phone.

Reviews.Title: ITS OK
Reviews.Author: KIBOI
Reviews.Content: Please send me the items manual to enable me operate it.The cell phone is ok but it is a bit too light.I hope it will be durable enough.Thanks,KIBOI

Reviews.Title: AWESOME, LIKE NEW!!!
Reviews.Author: V. ROMERO "VICTOR ROMERO"
Reviews.Content: I WAS ACTUALLY SHOCKED WHEN I OPENED THE BOX AND SAW HOW NEW THIS PHONE LOOKED AND WORKED!!!  IT CAME IS LESS THAN 5 DAYS.  THIS IS AN EXCELLENT SELLER!!!!  I RECOMEND HIM TO ALL!!!  THIS PHONE IS WONDERFUL!!!  I HAVE HAD IT OVER A WEEK!!!! MY ROOMMATE BROUGHT ONE FROM A POND SHOP FOR $53.00 AND I PAID $38.00 WITH SHIPPING INCLUDED!!!  AND MINE IS BETTER!!!

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: noel hobson
Reviews.Content: had too many scratch mark .DDD D D  D  D  D  DDDDDD DD  DDD  DDD  DDD  DD  DDD  D  D  D DDD  DDD  DDD  DDD  DDD  DDD  D  DDD  D D  D D D  D D  D  D

Reviews.Title: Bad Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Meggers
Reviews.Content: I bought this blackberry because my husband and I wanted to get straight talk, then we found out straight talk doesn't support blackberrys. So i sent a request to return the product and a refund. The phone never came and i never got my money put back. Tried writing the seller and i haven't heard from them in almost a month.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8310
Reviews.Author: Mr. Yarde
Reviews.Content: The first phone, was beautiful, but did not work at all.  When I called the company, they sent out another phone and that one works well.I will use this company again.  Overall, 8/10 experience.

Reviews.Title: what were they thinking?
Reviews.Author: Excellent
Reviews.Content: No instruction booklet came with the phone at all.  No box either. An unlocked but no internet connection at all. It was not what I saw

Reviews.Title: Phone arrived but didnt work
Reviews.Author: griffen williams
Reviews.Content: A total waste of time. Folks, learn the hard lesson I've learned, ONLY order items frm PRIME certified sellers. Ohterwise, you dont know what youre getting, spending your money like going to Vegas. Its a gamble.

Reviews.Title: black berry cure 8310
Reviews.Author: mollyann king
Reviews.Content: Eaven though it was a use phone, the condition was poor , I was expecting a little better,  the only good thing is that it is functioning pretty good, thank thou , still looking foward to do business with you in the near future. It has arrived on the date that was given,  that was excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: Works Great as advertised
Reviews.Author: Bret
Reviews.Content: the phone works Great for my mom she loves it I bought it for her because her old one same model was failing some of the keys were not working on her old one so I purchased this one for her

Reviews.Title: This is what phones used to be like!
Reviews.Author: Zach's Games Shacks!
Reviews.Content: Brand new in the box, who could want more?? It's a classic and is bullet proof. Modern manufacturers could take a few notes, hell Blackberry could take a few!

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: Lassina Kone
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a gift for my sister in-law. The phone functioned well but we could not change the language. Why make an unlocked phone to accept only one language? I could not go pass the fact that this phone was set to English only and you could not change the language. Unfortunately my sister in-law could only read and write French.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Quinlan.
Reviews.Content: I travel. Plug in a sim card and good to go at next to nothing. The phone arrived as described (looked new), and worked as described. All for a dirt cheap price.

Reviews.Title: No Good!
Reviews.Author: Linda L.
Reviews.Content: I was VERY excited to receive this item, only to discover that when I put the battery into the phone it was defective! The phone wouldn't recognize the battery and now I have to return for a refund. So disappointed...

Reviews.Title: Curve
Reviews.Author: bro
Reviews.Content: Some of the buttons are almost worn out, so you have to push them hard if you want to use them.It also buzzes when you talk on it sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Did not get  a book on how to use it!
Reviews.Author: vickie
Reviews.Content: I don't like this phone.First off I didn't get a book to show me how to use the phone.  Then I can not use it with my gohone sims card to get  on the internet!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8310
Reviews.Author: Brian D. Harris
Reviews.Content: Phone was new in box, worked with my sim card, has great features. Only draw back is hearing on the phone or it may be me getting older. I haven't decided which yet.

Reviews.Title: not good at all
Reviews.Author: djhon saliba
Reviews.Content: Very bad product It's broken not what expect about the phone the picture you me in the phone it defrance I received it.very bad phone.

Reviews.Title: black and bluie berry
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: phone won't charge through usb port. camera does not work properly. video won't send as mms file. old blackberry works 100 times better.

Reviews.Title: A fix to yesterday's review
Reviews.Author: Michelle Lineberger
Reviews.Content: I wrote a review yesterday and miss-spoke and wanted to  correct it I  said there was pics of a naked woman what I ment to write was inappropriate pics of a woman nearly naked. Amazon is dealing w the issue now. amazon has been very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Sandy Mayeux
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my husband. He has always liked a blackberry. I tried to get him to use some different more up dated phone and all he did was say "Please , baby order me another blackberry". So, the wonderful person that i am, he got his phone...!!! The other wore out, see he owns a Collision Center, and let me tell us, when i say he used/abused and killed his phone, he did...We gave it the proper burial..LOL

Reviews.Title: Jury Still Out
Reviews.Author: RJS
Reviews.Content: I still am not sure what I think about this phone.  It isn't all that easy to use, but it is an older phone. I will update either way as I learn more.

Reviews.Title: no wifi
Reviews.Author: josanne s.
Reviews.Content: this phone is quite outdated, it has limited internal memory with no option to upgrade, there is no wifi and doesnt seem to work with 3g or 2g. the phone i bought the bbm didn't work and i had to return it. Its not a bad buy if you just want a phone to make calls but if you need a smart phone this isnt it

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline
Reviews.Content: I love the phone definitely a reliable phone. It suits my personal needs. the size is what i was looking for

Reviews.Title: The blackberry cell phone
Reviews.Author: Teresa L Zermeno
Reviews.Content: I bought this cell phone for my granddaughter and she just loves it. She is a little more tech then I am and understands the cell phone more than myself. she loves it and that's what counts.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Larea McCree
Reviews.Content: I thought it would move a little faster and could handle the blackberry apps, but it does not look like it can.

Reviews.Title: Daughter Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Carla Bain-Sealey
Reviews.Content: Bought phone to replace Daughter's stolen blackberry.  The BBM is excellent and exactly what she was looking for in a phone

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Walter Monserratte "WALTERMON"
Reviews.Content: I bought this because it was exactly what i was looking for. I've used this phone for over 2 years now and I still have it

Reviews.Title: Missing items
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I ordered this item, per amozon, they suggest I return it and reorder this item. I did not contain the cade, car charger, cd and other items that were suppose to come with this phone. So be awaer it does not contain the accessories.

Reviews.Title: everything was great
Reviews.Author: Miguel Azuaje
Reviews.Content: everything was greatexcellent phone, very practical menu, take pictures and record videos of wonder! works for all operators used and Latin America, I am very happy with this purchase 100% recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Great For The Price
Reviews.Author: nisa609
Reviews.Content: I was due in for a new cell phone (I had a BlackBerry Pearl 8100), but I didn't want to spend a whole bunch of money. After comparing used phones on Amazon, Craigslist, T-Mobile (my carrier), and eBay, I picked this BlackBerry Curve from Amazon. Although this phone is an older model, to my surprise it looked brand new. Sure there were a couple of scratches on the phone as indicated in the product listing, but honestly, they are barely noticeable. All-in-all, I'm very pleased with my purchase for under $50 bucks!

Reviews.Title: blackberry
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: was received on time and works very well....am satisified customer. gave it to a friend as a gift, they are happy with it

Reviews.Title: bad cell phone
Reviews.Author: muneko
Reviews.Content: when i order this phone was everything ok but when my delivery comeso i check the phone the first thing i see the cell looks like reconstructedi try to put the battery and was so hard but i did it after them i star to usebut every time when i try to dialing numbers starting going crazy and write lettersi am so sad becouse now is brook and i just spandingn $110 dollars for use this phoneonly 3 weeks and i am a good good costumer from amazon DONT BUY THIS CELL

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Juan Marcano
Reviews.Content: buen producto y practico, excelente G R A C I A S S S S S S S S S

Reviews.Title: horribel !!!
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Seriously, This phone only has a nice look but it is not worth the pain... My daughter purchased this item for me and I know she feels sad knowing that am not happy with it, the phone makes a noise when you are on a call, this noise can seriously damage your earbells and I only have this phone for one week, the battery is drained out before 15 hours. I prefer my old out dated phone anyday above this phone... sorry

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Rosemary
Reviews.Content: los felicito trabajan muy bien y rápido el equipo esta como nuevo es lo que requiere el cliente sigan así

Reviews.Title: Return Item
Reviews.Content: I didn't have any use for this item after I received it so I returned it. Not a bad product, I just didn't want it.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: Steven E. Russell
Reviews.Content: The seller was fast, pleasant and efficient.  The product arrived quickly and as advertised. I highly recommend this firm and would use them again if the opportunity arose.

Reviews.Title: Do not bother
Reviews.Author: oravla
Reviews.Content: The curve is a downgrade from previous models. WiFi and gps barely work. You need a very strong signal for wifi. No 3G. The most annoying part is that you will have to change all your chargers and adapters because they changed the connector. The old mini-USB cable was very handy because it is shared by many manufactures so it was very easy to find someone to help you out in case you run out of battery on the road. Not anymore. Do not waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Sold as new but was used.  Missing Equip!
Reviews.Author: C. Verdu "Venezolano1980"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this phone as "new" and it arrived missing components that should have been in the package, not to mention the fact that the camera and flash were crusted in dirt/scum, and it just looked "used".  The cover doesn't close well...it leaves a gap when closing.  I attempted to contact customer service today immediately and was unable to get through.  I left a message and am awaiting a call return from Vibe cellular.  Hopefully they will take care of this quickly since this phone was purchased for a visiting relative who lives in another country and is leaving next week.  We are highly disappointed with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: fraud
Reviews.Author: Hendrick Arguello
Reviews.Content: "NOT ACQUIRE THESE PHONES ARE NOT NEW AND ALSO SERVE NO" I acquired one and only send it worked 2 weeks to review and was told that it will not work as it is rebuilt and ready to take very little time, do not buy it though the price is very low and offer a lot and not reality, is pure deception. I lost over $ 100 shipping cost. DO NOT LOSE YOUR MONEY, they also have no warranty.

Reviews.Title: deceptive salesman
Reviews.Author: myesid "Yesid Maury"
Reviews.Content: I buy a new product and they gave to me used, the blackberry curve 8310 i purchased is sulphated because the sticker on the back that indicates contact with watter is red what makes me think it has, beside that i cant instal the blackberry featrures because the phone is not entirerly unlocked. I would like to hear an answer from you because i want to chance the merchandise."

Reviews.Title: Sold as new but was used
Reviews.Content: The blackberry curve 8310 i purchased is sulphated because the sticker on the back that indicates contact withwatter is red what makes me think it has, beside that i cant instal the blackberry featrures because the phone is not entirerly unlocked. I would like to hear an answer from you because i want to change the merchandise

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile.
2G GSM: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
QWERTY keyboard, Trackball navigation, Blackberry Maps
Camera: 2 MP, 1600x1200 pixels, LED flash.
Internal Memory: 64 MB ROM, MicroSD expandable (4 GB max).
Document viewer (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF), Media player (MP4/WMV/H.263/H.264/MP3/WAV/eAAC+/WMA), Organizer.
QWERTY keyboard, Trackball navigation, Blackberry Maps, Document viewer (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF), Media player (MP4/WMV/H.263/H.264/MP3/WAV/eAAC+/WMA), Organizer.
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 8310 Unlocked Phone with GPS, 2MP Camera and Bluetooth
